entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSB4242: SDK Resolver Failure due to System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException #28488
  • Formatting with multi-line raw literals indents with `dotnet run` #28478
  • Trying to build with PublishAot=true on Mac ARM results in restore failure #28475
  • dotnet build/run failing (almost) siliently Ubuntu Linux #28471
  • [NETSDKE2E]Workloads are not displayed in "dotnet workload list" after upgrade from NET RC2 to NET7 RTM. #28451
  • [NETSDKE2E]Error happens "Workload installation failed: Access to the path 'C:\ProgramData\dotnet\workloads\Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task.Msi.x64\7.0.0-rtm.22507.1\msi.json' is denied." when instaling workload using another account. #28450
  • [Megathread] Infrastructure Issues #28442

Closed

  • Unable to build .NET Core 3.1 or .NET 6.0 after installed .NET 7.0 RTM SDK #28027
  • 'dotnet store' cannot find System.Runtime #28462

PullRequests

Created

  • Stable branding #28485
    Area-Infrastructure
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28483
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GA / 7.0.1xx Internal -> External Port] Fix SDK Temp Paths #28477
    Area-Infrastructure, Priority:0
  • [Internal -> External Port (7.0.1xx-RC2)] Fix SDK Temp Paths #28476
    Area-Infrastructure, Priority:0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28474
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #28470
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #28469
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #28468
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #28467
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28446
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28445
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28444

Merged

  • Add an official builder assembly attribute #28400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Reference net7.0 version of msbuild for source-build #28425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28398
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert perma-escaping of semicolons and support semicolon-delimited unquoted property values #27859
    Bug, Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 6.0.11
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28447
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add actionable output to templating destructive changes notification #28428
    Area-dotnet new
  • Update branding to 6.0.306 #28323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.403 #28324
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2017846 #27667
  • Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. #28380
    Area-Infrastructure
